commands.name: Dev: Serve Full Stack
commands.description: Run npm run dev:serve to start HTTP + UI servers with diagnostics

commands.name: debug
commands.description: Run dev-serve in the background, then show the debugging workflow

shell.command: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; LOG_FILE="/tmp/neotoma-dev-serve.log"; if pgrep -f scripts/dev-serve.js >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[debug] Stopping existing dev-serve instance..."; pkill -f scripts/dev-serve.js >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; sleep 1; fi; echo "[debug] Starting dev-serve in background (logs: $LOG_FILE)..."; nohup npm run dev:serve >"$LOG_FILE" 2>&1 & PID=$!; sleep 2; echo "[debug] dev-serve running with PID $PID. Monitor logs via: tail -f $LOG_FILE"; cat .cursor/commands/debug.md'

commands.name: Setup: Copy Env File
commands.description: Copy .env file from main repository to this worktree

shell.name: dev-serve
shell.description: Start the full-stack dev serve orchestration (HTTP + UI servers) with diagnostics and port URLs
